titles.title: Supporting the continued work of the Millennium Challenge Corporation as it celebrates the 20th anniversary of its creation.
Supporting the continued work of the Millennium Challenge Corporation as it celebrates the 20th anniversary of its creation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Millennium Challenge Corporation (MCC) on 20 years of reducing global poverty by delivering economic growth and recognizes that the MCC contributes directly to the national interests of the United States. (The MCC is an independent federal agency that provides economic assistance to developing nations that show positive performance in the areas of democratic governance, economic freedom, and investment in their population.)
